game.name: Animal Olympics - Triple Jump
game.description:
Jumping is really a big fun for many boys and girls. If you love to enjoy such activities, join Animal Olympics - Triple Jump and get a chance to be a part of the biggest jump event ever! In this brand new sports game, you will have to hop, step and jump to help kiwis to win the gold medal. This is a world popular Triple jump event, so please do your best to achieve the goal of the game. Control a kiwi and help it to jump as far as possible within 3 attempts. Have fun in the kiwi kingdom in this free online game for boys!

You will see the kiwi on the field when you click the start. Press the left and right arrow keys to help kiwi run on the field. Help it to jump using the up arrow key and set the jumping angle holding the up arrow key. You will see a power gauge on the screen when you hold the up arrow key. Release the key immediately if you find out the jumping angle suitable at that time. This will help the kiwi to jump and land on the sand pit perfectly.  

The screen will show you the distance of the jump and the referee will then check out the camera to determine if the jump is foul or not. A clean jump will be declared if the white flag has been raised, while raising a red flag means that the kiwi has stepped on the takeoff line and as a result its jump will be forfeited. Take kiwi to the field again to complete the remaining attempts. Take the responsibility to lead the kiwi towards the glorious victory in this one of the best Olympics sports game!

game.webControlKeys: L-R ARROWS TO RUN, UP ARROW/SPACE-JUMP
